column3: (เขาคงไม่เผยความลับต่อข้าโดยง่าย ข้าควรฟังข้าหรือไม่?)

column2: Big brother, why don't you have any curiosity?
column3: พี่ใหญ่ ทำไมพี่ไม่มีความอยากรู้บ้างล่ะ?

column2: Well, never mind, Xiao Bao will tell you.\nUnder a tree with pink leaves in the <color=#c44b0e>Lost Forest</color>, there grows a big Lingzhi!
column3: ไม่เป็นไรเสี่ยวเปาจะบอกเอง\nใต้ต้นไม้ที่มีใบสีชมพูใน <color=#c44b0e>ป่าสาปสูญ</color> มีเห็ดหลินจือต้นใหญ่เติบโตอยู่!

column2: However, if you go there late and the Lingzhi is eaten by the wild boars, you can't blame Xiao Bao.
column3: อย่างไรก็ตาม หากพี่ไปที่นั่นช้าและเห็ดหลินจือถูกหมูป่ากิน พี่จะโทษเสี่ยวเปาไม่ได้นะ

column2: Did big brother get the Wooden sword for Xiao Bao?
column3: พี่ใหญ่, ท่านได้กระบี่ไม้สำหรับเสี่ยวเปาหรือไม่?

column2: (What should I do?)
column3: (ข้าควรทำอย่างไรดี?)

column2: Great, Xiao Bao finally has a Wooden sword of his own!
column3: เยี่ยมมาก, ในที่สุดเสี่ยวเปาก็มีกระบี่ไม้เป็นของตัวเองแล้ว!

column2: The secret is -\nUnder a tree with pink leaves in the <color=#c44b0e>Lost Forest</color>, there grows a big Lingzhi!
column3: ความลับก็คือ-\nใต้ต้นไม้ที่มีใบสีชมพูใน <color=#c44b0e>ป่าสาปสูญ</color> มีเห็ดหลินจือต้นใหญ่เติบโตอยู่!

column2: By the way, young man, if you go hunting in the Lost Forest, can you get me <color=#c44b0e>5 Snake galls</color>?
column3: เออนี่ เจ้าหนุ่ม ถ้าเจ้าไปล่าสัตว์ที่ป่าสาปสูญ เจ้าช่วยนำ<color=#c44b0e>ดีงู 5 ชิ้น</color>มาให้ข้าได้ไหม?

column2: Snake gall? What do you need Snake gall for, old man?
column3: ดีงู? ท่านต้องการดีงูไปเพื่ออะไร, ตาแก่?

column2: Of course, it's for making wine, what else could I use it for?
column3: แน่นอนว่ามันเอาไว้หมักสุรา จะใช้ทำอะไรได้อีกล่ะ?

column2: (The butcher actually uses Snake Gall to make wine, this...)
column3: (จริงๆ แล้วคนขายเนื้อใช้น้ำดีงูในการหมักสุรา นี่...)

column2: Oh? What's the benefit? Tell me, young man!
column3: โอ้? มีประโยชน์อะไร? บอกมาได้เลย, หนุ่มน้อย!

column2: If the Snake gall wine is properly made, it can dispel wind, activate collaterals, form qi and blood, nourish yin and strengthen yang, dispel dampness and dispel cold.
column3: หากทำสุราดีงูได้อย่างเหมาะสม ก็สามารถขับไล่ลม กระตุ้นการไหลเวียนของเลือดและลมปราน บำรุงหยินเสริมหยาง ขจัดความชื้น และขจัดความเย็น

column2: In addition, there are also three Snake gall wines and five Snake gall wines made from the gall of three or five different snakes.
column3: นอกจากนี้ยังมี สุราดองดีงูสามชนิดและสุราดองดีงูห้าชนิดที่ทำจากดีงูสามหรือห้าชนิดที่แตกต่างกัน

column2: I didn't know it had these benefits!\nThe old doctor always says this is not good, that is not good, I don't quite understand.
column3: ข้าไม่รู้ว่ามันมีประโยชน์เหล่านี้!\nหมอเฒ่ามักบอกเสมอว่า ไม่ดี ไม่ดี ข้าก็ไม่ค่อยเข้าใจ

column2: The doctor must be afraid that you can't clean the Snake gall properly.\nYou just need to remove all the foreign objects in the Snake gall.
column3: หมอต้องกลัวว่าจะเจ้าจะล้างดีงูไม่ถูกวิธี\nเจ้าเพียงแค่ต้องเอาสิ่งแปลกปลอมทั้งหมดที่อยู่ในถุงน้ำของดีงูออก

column2: I see! I didn't expect you to know so much about this!\nI have a jar of Snake gall wine here, why don't you drink with me, young man!
column3: ข้าเข้าใจแล้ว! ไม่คิดว่าเจ้าจะรู้เรื่องนี้มากขนาดนี้!\nดีข้ามีไหสุราดองดีงูอยู่ที่นี่ ทำไมไม่มาร่วมวงดื่มกับข้าล่ะ, พ่อหนุ่ม!

column2: Then I'll take your offer.
column3: แล้วข้าจะรับข้อเสนอของเจ้า

column2: Hahaha, it's so enjoyable to have someone to drink with!\nBut the Snake gall wine just now was my last reserve.
column3: ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า, มันดีมากที่ได้มีคนมาร่วมดื่มด้วย!\nแต่สุราดองดีงูไหนี้เป็นสุราไหสุดท้ายของข้าแล้ว

column2: Of course! It has a unique taste!\nI've been drinking it for more than ten years, I just love it!
Next time if there's a chance, let's have a drink together!
Oh no, I was so busy chatting with you that I forgot about work!
Young man, about the <color=#c44b0e>5 Snake galls</color>...
column3: พ่อหนุ่ม, เกี่ยวกับ <color=#c44b0e>ดีงู 5 ชิ้น</color>นี้...

column2: (Should I help the butcher collect Snake Galls?)
1, 2, 3, 4, 5, well, I've got enough Snake galls for the butcher,\nI'll deliver them to him when I go back to the village.
column3: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, เอาล่ะ ข้ามีดีงูเพียงพอสำหรับคนขายเนื้อแล้ว\nข้าจะส่งพวกมันไปให้เขาเมื่อข้ากลับไปที่หมู่บ้าน

column2: Old man, I've got the 5 Snake galls.
column3: ตาแก่ ข้าได้ดีงู 5 ชิ้นแล้ว

column2: Really? Let me see.
Good! Nice Snake galls, you did a great job, young man!\nThese Snake galls will last me for a few months!
column3: ดีมาก! เป็นดีงูที่คุณภาพดี เจ้าทำได้ดีมาก, พ่อหนุ่ม!\nดีงูพวกนี้คงจะอยู่กับข้าไปได้อีกสักสองสามเดือน!

column2: I have some freshly cut top-quality Pork here, I'll give it to you, young man!
Alright, thank you, brother.
Well, I guess I'll have to ask someone else then.

column2: (Should I help the butcher collect Snake Galls?)
Young man, please hold on!

I noticed you had a fight with someone and you have quite a few internal injuries and bruises.\nIf not treated in time, it could lead to serious damage to your internal organs, or even threaten your life.
If you trust me, you can let me help you with some blood circulation.\nUnder my unique technique, you will be as vigorous as a dragon and a tiger.
Do you need me to help you regulate your Qi and blood?
How do you feel now?\nDo you feel full of energy and vitality?
What a great skill you have, old man!\nNow I don't have to worry about being beaten half to death and having nowhere to get treatment.
You wish! I can't do this kind of energy-consuming thing too often.\nYou might as well try my Medicine, it can also replenish your blood and energy.
Young man, if you need anything, just come to me. I'll be waiting here.
Woof! Woof woof!
Wow! This dog is so fierce, it seems I can't get in.
Wow! This dog is so fierce.\nIf I can get along with its owner, maybe it will be nicer to me.
Young master, I guarantee you'll be satisfied this time.
If it's as you say, I won't treat you unfairly!
We have guests!\n{PlayerName}, please greet them.
Gentlemen, are you here for a meal or to stay?
We're not here for you, good dog, don't get in the way, get lost!
Oh, I was wondering who it was, isn't this Fat Master?\nFat Master, you dare to come here?
How... how is it you again?\nGet lost now, if you provoke our young master, even several lives won't be enough for you!
You're right, I'm just a good-for-nothing idler.\nI will go back and start over, learn what is called righteousness.\nI will not let you down!
Young... young master, what's wrong with you? Why are you talking nonsense?
column3: นาย...นายน้อย เกิดอะไรขึ้นกับท่าน ทำไมท่านถึงพูดจาไร้สาระเช่นนั้น

column2: Bastard! All you know is to cause trouble, you've lost all my face!\nDon't make a fool of yourself here, go back to the mansion with me and study!

column2: With just a few words, you've made that spoiled brat repent,\nyou're much better than those rude people who only know how to hurt others with their fists.
column3: แค่พูดไม่กี่คำ ก็ทำให้เจ้าเด็กถูกตามใจนั่นกลับตัวกลับใจได้\nเจ้านี่ยอดเยี่ยมกว่าพวกคนหยาบช้าที่รู้จักแต่ใช้กำปั้นทำร้ายผู้อื่นนัก

column2: Fighting and killing is too dangerous, and there's a risk of HP danger.\nIf you can solve the problem by talking, why not do it safely and effortlessly?
column3: การต่อสู้ และการฆ่าฟันล้วนอันตรายเกินไป และเสี่ยงแก่ชีวิต\nหากสามาระแก้ปัญหาด้วยการพูดคุยได้โดยไม่ต้องใช้แรง หรือเสี่ยงใดๆ เหตุใดจึงไม่ใช้มันล่ะ

With a few punches and kicks, you drove these bastards away, I didn't expect you to be so capable.\nMuch better than those who only know how to talk.

column3: ไว้ชีวิตข้าเถอะนายท่าน!\nข-ข้าา เพิ่งได้ยินมาว่านายหญิงที่นี่ทำอาหารเก่งก็เลยมาดูเอง!\nข ขะ-ข้า ไม่มีเจตนาอื่นจริงๆ!

column2: It was an accident that we offended you, we know our mistake, we'll leave right away!

column2: Wait a moment, all visitors are guests, especially those who come for the reputation.\nIf I don't let the guest taste my cooking,\nIf word gets out that I don't know how to treat guests, how can I continue my business?
column3: รอสักครู่ ผู้มาเยือนทุกคนล้วนเป็นแขกของเรา โดยเฉพาะผู้ที่มาเพราะได้ยินชื่อเสียงของข้า\nหากข้าไม่ให้แขกได้ชิมฝีมือทำอาหาร\nแล้วคนกล่าวออกไปว่าข้าไม่รู้จักดูแลแขก เช่นนั้นกิจการของข้าคงไม่อาจทำต่อแล้ว

column2: This carefully prepared Mapo tofu is specially prepared for you.\nLet's give you a discount, 300 Wen per serving, one serving for each of you,\nI'll round down a bit for you, let's call it 1000 Wen.
Who would order so much Tofu!\nAnd you're overcharging, why don't you just rob us!
column3: ใครจะไปสั่งเต้าหู้มากเช่นนี้!\nและนี่เจ้าก็คิดแพงเกินไป เช่นนี้ทำไม่ปล้นเราตรงๆซะล่ะ!

column2: We'll buy this Tofu!\nHere's your money, we'll definitely take the Tofu back and taste it carefully!

column2: Get out of here quickly
column3: ออกไปจากที่นี่โดยเร็ว

column2: Hmph, dare to lay a hand on our young master, you must be tired of living!

column2: You guys be careful not to kill him and cause trouble for me.

column2: Yes!

Since we've met, it's fate, so I'll teach you a martial art.\nWhat kind of kung fu do you want to learn?
I want to choose...
I don't have time to guide you one by one, here's a manual for you to comprehend on your own.\nAlso, I'll give you a weapon, so you can bring out the effect of this martial art.
Since we've met, it's fate, so I'll give you a weapon as a souvenir.\nWhat kind of weapon do you want?
I want to choose...
Although it's not a rare item, it's enough for a beginner to defend himself.\nHere's another manual for you. Take it and learn well. You won't be bothered by a few thieves.
Hmm? What's this?

column2: It looks like some kind of fist technique?
So it is, and so it goes...
I've got it!
Since it was obtained in the {Ruined shrine}, let's call it "Abandoned Temple Fist"!
Hmm... No, I can't understand what it's depicting...
It seems that my fist technique is not proficient enough to understand this fist technique.
I'll come back and look at it when I'm more proficient in my fist technique...
Could this be a wild boar den? So many wild boars have appeared, it seems I'm in for a tough fight!
Hehe, a pink tree! Big {Lingzhi}! I finally found it.
Hurry up and pick up the {Lingzhi}, lest you forget later.
column3: รีบเก็บ<color=#c44b0e>เห็ดหลินจือ</color>เสียเร็ว เดี๋ยวจะลืมเสียก่อน

column2: I'm so lucky, I almost missed this treasure.
These wild boars are so powerful!\nNo {Lingzhi} is more important than my life, I dare not covet this treasure.
These wild boars are so powerful, I almost lost my life.\nI'm not capable enough to deal with these wild boars,\nI'll come back to get this hundred-year-old {Lingzhi} when I'm stronger.
These wild boars are still guarding here,\nIt seems this treasure is also very important to them, I'm even more determined to get it.
Is that... {Lingzhi}?!\nSuch a big {Lingzhi} grows in such a place!
I need to dig it up quickly,\nI'm so lucky, I've made a fortune this time!
Hmm? What's happening up ahead?
Brother, it looks like we're done for today!
Big brother, there's no way out!
Let's run!
Hmm? The retreat is blocked!
Brother, we have no choice but to fight!
Let's do it, big brother!
These two are being attacked by wild wolves, should we help them?
Let's go!
Ah!
It hurts!
Howl!!
Howl!!!!
These beasts are so rampant!
Dare to hurt people in broad daylight!
I'll lend you a hand!
Hmm? There's help!
Yes, big brother! We're saved!
Stop talking, let's fight!
A great favor is beyond words.
Hero, we need to go back early.
This {Wild Wolf Valley} is very dangerous!
Hero, don't stay too long!
See you later!
Exactly!
Young hero, we two brothers don't have much to offer.
These are our gains this time, all for you, hero!
How can I accept this?
(Naturally reaches out to take it)
You're nothing but a fart every day! Idiot, thank the hero quickly!
Big brother, didn't you say that a great favor is beyond words?
Get lost!
Pant... pant...\nThese wild wolves are too scary
It's a pity that I couldn't save the two of them, even if they were bandits, they were still two lives...
The weather is perfect for sailing today. Young man, do you want to take a boat across the river?\nIt's 50 {Sincere} each time.
Hey! Kid, are you blind?\nYou bumped into me and hurt me. You can't run away without paying some medical expenses today!
(This guy is obviously trying to blackmail me, what should I do?)
So many brothers are taking action, you have a big face!\nThis medical fee will have to be a bit more, to teach you a lesson, so you won't be so arrogant in the future!
It's rare to meet someone as reasonable as you, I won't make things difficult for you!\nBe careful where you're going next time, don't hurt people again.
You dare to attack in broad daylight!\nA wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him, just you wait!\nI'll let you off today, but if I see you again, I won't be so kind!
Well, well, we've got a tough one here. Brothers, let's get to work!
Brothers, we've been idle for too long, today we're in for some fun!
A wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him, just you wait and see!
You have no manners! I'll teach you a lesson, let's see if you'll behave next time!
Help! There's a gang of villains bullying innocent people in the street!
column3: ช่วยด้วย! มีพวกอันธพาลกำลังรังแกผู้บริสุทธิ์บนท้องถนน!

column2: You bunch dare to bully others just because you outnumber them!\nGet out of my sight, if I see you again, I'll have you arrested and brought to the county office!
Well, well, we've got a tough one here. Brothers, let's get to work!
Brothers, we've been idle for too long, today we're in for some fun!
We admit defeat today. A wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him, just you wait and see!
Young hero, I see a dark cloud over your forehead, I fear you may face a bloody disaster soon!\nWould you like to learn about the method of Crack?
(Is this a scare tactic or a prophecy? What should I do?)
I have altered your fate,\nUnless there's an accident, you won't face a bloody disaster, you can rest easy.
I have already damaged my own cultivation by peeping into the secrets of heaven,\nI'm afraid I can't help you in your situation, you should pray for good luck.
Even if I had great abilities, I couldn't save someone as stubborn as you.\nYou should pray for good luck, don't regret it when it's too late.
That Taoist was just bluffing, I didn't see any bloody disaster, it's all nonsense!
Ouch! I sprained my back when I wasn't paying attention, is this the bloody disaster?\nIf I had known this, I would have spent money to avoid the disaster.

Young hero, I see that you have an extraordinary bone structure, you are a one in a million Martial genius.\nI have a few secret martial arts books here, if you're interested, I can sell them to you at a discount.
(Beggars are often extraordinary people in ancient times, but I can't tell what this one is, what should I do now?)
I have a Pill given to me by a friend in the martial arts world, please accept it,\nIt might be of some help to you.
Hey, it's inconvenient to carry so much money around, isn't it?\nWhy not let us keep it for you, so you don't have to worry about being robbed all day.
You've offended us, let's see how you can live peacefully in the future!\nHmph, there's plenty of time for payback.
We've robbed the rich to help the poor today!\nKid, the money in your Money bag is mine now.
column3: วันนี้เราได้ปล้นคนรวยมาช่วยคนจนแล้ว!\nไอ้หนู, เงินในถุงเงินของเจ้าเป็นของข้าแล้ว

column2: This Manual is ancient, the cover and pages are damaged, I don't know what martial arts it is.\nYou can study it slowly, given time, you will surely master it!
I can't bear to see such a gem buried in the mundane world.\nAlright, I'll give you a discount, give me 1 guan of money, and this Manual is yours.
You don't even have 1 guan of money, I'm really helpless.\nWhat a pity, you've missed the chance to become a peerless master.
It's okay if you don't have 10 guan of money, but I'm really hungry...\nI wonder if you could spare some change, so I can buy a few buns to fill my stomach.
You seem to be a man of means, why so stingy!\nEven a beggar has his dignity, your money is simply an insult to me. Pah!
Such a generous person, thank you for your timely help!
I have a Pill given to me by a friend in the martial arts world, please accept it,\nIt might be of some help to you.
Such a generous person, thank you for your timely help!
Young hero, please wait, I have a money-making opportunity here, invest 100 Wen and earn 200 Wen.\nAre you interested in participating?
(This guy looks like a wealthy man, but I don't know if his way of making money is credible, what should I do?)
I'll always be in this city, young hero, when you have more money, feel free to come find me,\nbusiness is not successful, friendship is still there.
You big liar, you tricked me out of my money!\nGive me back my money right now, or I won't be polite!
Haven't you heard that there are risks in the market, and investment needs to be cautious?\nIt's normal to lose and gain in business, there's no such thing as a sure win.
(This person seems to make some sense, if I push him too hard, he might fight back, what should I do now?)
That's more like it, let's make money in harmony,\nnext time there's a chance to make money, let's continue to cooperate.\nThere's always tomorrow, losing a horse might be a blessing.
You brat, you refuse to drink a toast and must suffer a forfeit!\nGuards, teach him a lesson!
Alright, leave it to us, don't worry!
Bastard, you dare to fight back!\nFine, since you're heartless, don't blame me for being unrighteous!\nHere's your capital back! We'll see about the future!
Pah, you dare to challenge me with your half-baked skills!\nIf you can't afford to lose, don't pretend to be a high roller!
This 100 Wen is a bit less, but one can't be too greedy, every little bit counts.\n<color=#c44b0e>Twelve shichen</color> later, wait for my good news.
Big win! Young hero, you're really lucky, your investment of 100 Wen is now 250 Wen.\nYou've earned a full 150 Wen, it seems we should cooperate more in the future.
Alas, it's really bad luck, I only received 150 Wen, only earned 50 Wen.\nI'm really sorry, young hero, I'll make sure to earn more for you next time.
I'm really sorry, young hero, this time I even lost the capital.\nFortunately, the investment was not large, a big win next time will make up for it, don't be too discouraged.
What a bold move!\nYoung hero, rest assured, this 1 Guan of money in my hands, I will make sure it generates more money.\n<color=#c44b0e>Twelve shichen</color> later, wait for my good news.
Big win! Young hero, you're really lucky, your investment of 1 Guan is now 2 Guan.\nYou've earned double, it seems you're about to become a god of wealth.
The market is not good recently, I can only help you break even.\nWait for a while, there might be a turn for the better, then we can cooperate on a big one!
It's been so long, and that merchant hasn't shown up, did he run away with my money?
There's an inventory lost on the road, there's no one around, what should I do?
Thank you, young man, for guarding my inventory,\nif it was picked up by a bad person, our whole family would starve to death.\nThis is a small token of my gratitude, please don't refuse.
No! The amount of money in this Inventory is incorrect, you must have taken some, right?\nTsk, such a disgrace!
Since this is an unclaimed Inventory, everything inside belongs to me now.
Excuse me, young man, have you seen an Inventory around here?\nIt was accidentally dropped by me, and it contains something very important to me!\nIf you have seen it, please let me know.
(I didn't expect the owner of the Inventory to appear so quickly, what should I do?)
Thank you, young man, for helping me find the Inventory, you've done me a great favor!\nThis small token of appreciation is the least I can do.
The amount of money in this Inventory is incorrect, you must have taken some, right?\nAh, the world is going downhill, I was going to give you a reward, but I guess I won't now.
Yes, yes, this is my Inventory,\nLook at the hefty amount of silver here, isn't it what I lost?\nHehe, I'm financially comfortable again.
(I have a feeling this Inventory isn't his, I think I gave it to the wrong person)
This is not the Inventory I lost, I can't just claim it.\n(This person didn't take the Inventory, he shook his head and ran away)
(Fortunately, this person is not greedy, otherwise, he would have taken the Inventory. But what should I do with this Inventory now?)
I see, it might have been picked up by someone else.\nI hope it can be found soon, otherwise, my family and I won't be able to get by.
Since I've waited for so long and the owner hasn't come to claim it, I've done my part.\nI'll take this Inventory myself.
(I see an old man lying on the ground ahead, groaning in pain, should I go and help?)
Hmph, at least you know what's good for you!\nSince you're so sincere, I won't make things difficult for you, you can go.
After a shichen, two yamen runners came leisurely
You old man, you're at it again with your dishonest business! How disrespectful!\nIf we catch you scamming people again, we'll put you in jail!
You young man, you're kind-hearted, but you probably haven't suffered enough.\nLearn from this lesson and don't be too eager to play the good Samaritan in the future.
Why don't you settle this trivial matter privately? Why do we have to run all the way here!
I wanted to settle it privately, but this young man wouldn't let me.\nHe insisted on calling the officials, as if the Government Office was his own property!
column3: ข้าต้องการที่จะจัดการเป็นการส่วนตัว แต่ชายหนุ่มคนนี้ไม่ยอมให้ข้าทำ\nเขายืนกรานจะเรียกเจ้าหน้าที่ราวกับว่าศาลาว่าการเป็นทรัพย์สินของเขาเอง!

column2: Hmph, you ignorant youngster.\nYou hit the old man first, and then disturbed the Official, two crimes in one... you're fined... \nYes, you're fined <color=#c44b0e>10 guan</color>, that's not too much, is it!
(These people are clearly in cahoots, what should I do?)
That's more like it! We like young people who listen to advice!\nYou'll definitely go far in the future, hehehe.
Kid, dare to resist law enforcement, prepare to suffer!
Good lad, you dare to assault an Official in public!\nYou wait for me, I'll make you kneel in front of me and apologize!
Tsk, you fancy pillow, dare to challenge us! Hand it over!\n(They snatched the materials from you and walked away laughing and chatting with the old man)
column3: จุ๊ๆ เจ้าหมอนแฟนซี กล้าท้าทายพวกเรา! มอบมันมา!\n(พวกเขาแย่งของจากคุณแล้วเดินออกไปหัวเราะและพูดคุยกับชายชรา)

column2: So many people have come and gone, but only you were willing to help me.\nIf it weren't for your kindness, this old man might have already met his end.\nI will make sure my son repays your kindness.
Father, how are you feeling? I'm sorry, I've been too busy with official duties to take care of you.\nIf you've hurt yourself, I'll regret it forever.
Thanks to this young man's help, otherwise we might not have been able to see each other again.
Thank you for your help, young hero. Please accept this small token of my gratitude.
Ouch, I think I've hurt myself badly, I can't move now.\nYoung man, I might need your help to take me to the doctor.
(It seems the old man is seriously injured, what should I do?)
Thanks to you for bringing this old man here in time, any later and his life might have been in danger.
Thank you, young man. I don't have much to offer as a thank you...\nAll I can do is spread the word of your heroic deeds, hoping that everyone can take you as an example.
Young man, you have a healing touch. My pain has lessened considerably.\nYou're even better than the doctors in the city, please accept this small token of my gratitude.

Not long after you ran away, the old man fainted due to his severe injuries.\nPeople saw you passing by without helping, and they criticized your cold-heartedness,\nWord spread, and the people in the city gradually began to distance themselves from you...
The old man lay on the ground for a long time, in the end, he had to struggle to get up and limp home.
Because of the delay, the opportunity to heal was missed, and he was left with a disability in his legs, causing unbearable pain on rainy days...
After you left, the old man got up on his own, dusted off his clothes and seemed to be fine.
Then a man came out of the alley, the two whispered to each other, and finally looked in the direction you ran away with resentment...
Boy, don't you dare leave!\nYou knocked me down and you think you can just walk away? That's not how it works!
Brother, you're in trouble!\nYou injured the old man, you have to pay for the medical expenses, at least ten taels of silver!
If you don't want to make a big deal out of this, just pay one tael of silver and settle it privately.
(This is really bad luck, I tried to help but ended up being misunderstood, what should I do?)
Clouds to rain, snow to wind...
Flowers to trees, birds to insects...
Mountains are clear and waters are beautiful, willows are green and peaches are red...
Old man, what are you mumbling about?
This is the basic rule of couplets, the so-called learning from the past,\nEven though I am the top couplet writer in Bianzhou city, I still need to review regularly.
This doesn't seem difficult, do you really need to review it regularly?
You ignorant child! You dare to challenge the couplet I came up with?
(Should I engage in a couplet contest with the teacher?)
Listen to me, the first line of the couplet is...
Hmm, not bad. Let's continue, listen to the second line...
Such a good second line! Listen carefully to the last line...
I didn't expect you to be so knowledgeable,\nI need to think of a few new couplets to see if I can stump you.
I've had enough fun today, come back another day.
No, no, this response to the couplet is inappropriate!\nYou seem to be off today, my friend. Perhaps you should come back another day.
Hmph, all talk and no action, untrained.\nI doubt you have the courage to respond to my couplet!
Good! Your courage is commendable. Today, you will experience my prowess!\nAs long as you can respond to my three couplets, I will overlook your rudeness.
Listen carefully, the first couplet is...
Hmm, your response is passable, you got it right. Now listen to the second couplet...
Your response to this couplet is also neat and appropriate, you got it right.\nThe last couplet of mine is absolute, listen carefully...
You managed to respond to the third couplet as well, I didn't expect that. It seems I underestimated you.\nI'm bored to death, if you have time, why not come and keep me company every day?
Completely wrong, it makes no sense!\nYou should go back and study for a few more years before showing off in front of me.
Did you come prepared this time? Dare to respond to my couplet again?
(Should I engage in a couplet contest with the teacher?)
How have you been, my friend? Would you like to respond to a few more couplets with me?
(Should I engage in a couplet contest with the teacher?)
(How should I respond?)
Write about the world
Learn to be a match for thousands
Reading to save the world
Poetic and picturesque
Time adds years
Sky high and day long
Wang's book, the character for rice
A man without trust cannot stand
Spring wind urges all things
Bright moon shines between the pines
Think thrice before you step
Moon rises, flowers speak
Universe hidden in the chest

column2: Peaceful days year after year
Lonely and cold, alone by the window
Green water has no worries, but the wind wrinkles its surface
Fog locks the mountain, mountain locks the fog
People are safe, the country is prosperous, it's a golden age
Sea to the horizon, sky forms the shore
Close the door, push out the moon in front of the window
All worldly matters are clear, all are knowledge
May I ask your business?
I am Ye Pengju's daughter, Ye Yinping.

So you are the young lady of the Ye family! I apologize for not recognizing you,\nThe Chai and Ye families have been friends for generations. Miss, you can come and go freely in the mansion, no need to report.
{PlayerSurName} is my friend, you see...
Since you are a friend of Miss Yinping, you are a guest of our mansion. Please come in.
This invitation was used to invite guests to the prince's birthday banquet,\nbut the banquet is over now, so this invitation is useless.
Our prince is not seeing guests at the moment, please leave.
Alright, you can go in, but remember not to wander around,\nIf you annoy the prince, I can't protect you.
{yell} You villain, you killed Prince Kang Wang, today I will fight you to the death!
column3: {yell} ไอ้โจรชั่ว, แกฆ่าองค์ชายคังหวัง วันนี้จะข้าขอต่อสู้กับเจ้าจนตาย!

column2: When will the cycle of revenge end, why do you force me?
May I ask your business?
I am Ye Pengju's daughter, Ye Yinping, here to wish Uncle Chai a happy birthday on behalf of my father.

So you are the young lady of the Ye family! I apologize for not recognizing you,\nThe Chai and Ye families have been friends for generations. Miss, you can come and go freely in the mansion, no need to report.
{PlayerSurName} is my friend, also here to wish Uncle Chai a happy birthday, you see...
Since you are a friend of Miss Yinping, you are a guest of our mansion. Please come in.
Welcome, esteemed guests, please come in~
Normally we can be flexible, but not today.\nToday is the prince's birthday banquet, we servants can't make any mistakes. You'll have to find another way.
{yell} Stop!
You look like a martial artist,\nAre you a bandit from the nearby mountains trying to sneak into the city to cause trouble?
Do you have anything to prove your identity or origin?
I didn't expect you to be so sensible! Alright, you can go in.\nBut don't cause any trouble, or we'll arrest you as a bandit!
It's been a long time since I've heard such a touching story,\nI didn't expect your life to be so pitiful, I can't stand to hear such things, let's hurry into the city.
I hope you can find your relatives soon.
Why do I feel like I've heard this story before...
Who is the uncle between us?
...Of course it's you.
You little brat, you still recognize me as your uncle!\nSince I'm your uncle, shouldn't you listen to me in everything?
Uncle, everything else is fine, but this...
Young man over there, can you help me settle this dispute?\nI, as an elder, told this brat to respect his elders and love the young, that's not wrong, right?
Respecting the old and loving the young is a virtue of our generation, of course it's not wrong!
I am his uncle, he is my nephew, he should listen to me, right?
In principle, there should be order between the old and the young, the nephew should listen to the uncle, of course that's not wrong!
Now that I, as an uncle, am short of money,\nasking my nephew to get some drinks, that's not too much, right?
Of course it's too much!\nUncle, you want to pawn our master's personal sword for drinks!
I can't comply with this matter, no matter what!
Look at this stubborn kid, he's even more troublesome than his master.\nYoung man, we're destined to meet, can you help me out?
Is this really for me?\nYou're not planning anything, are you?
If you don't trust me, I'll take it back, as if I never came.
Oh dear, just a joke, why so serious?\nIf you don't know me, you must be a newbie in the martial arts world, no wonder you look so naive.
Listen up, kid!\nIn the drunkenness, Heaven and Earth are vast, and the sun and moon are long in the pot - I am the Taoist Master <color=#c44b0e>La Tazhang</color>.
La Tazhang?! Are you the La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect?!
Junior {PlayerName} has seen Senior Zhang.\nSenior's name is Acclaimed, Junior -
Go away, what junior and senior, I hate these formalities the most!\nI'm going to taste the good wine. Kid, we'll meet again if we're destined!
I am Chang Chunzi, thank you for your help, young hero.\nI'll go take care of my uncle to prevent him from causing trouble again, and I'll thank you properly another day.
Hey, this is...
It seems to be a martial arts manual? It must have been left by that senior.\nConsider it his return gift for this wine, I won't be polite and just take it!
This is great, someone is treating, I can indulge myself again.
Good wine, good food, good kid!\nThere are such delicacies in the world, my trip is not in vain!
Kid, I am La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect, I won't let you treat me to this meal for nothing!\nIf you ever have trouble on the road, feel free to come to the Taoist Sect and find me!
Is it really La Tazhang?! Are you the La Tazhang from the Taoist Sect?!
Junior {PlayerName} has seen Senior Zhang.\nJunior was ignorant and didn't recognize -
Go away, what junior and senior, I hate these formalities the most!
I'm full today, we'll meet again if we're destined!
In the drunkenness, Heaven and Earth are vast~
And the sun and moon are long in the pot~

My uncle is used to being idle, I hope you don't mind, young hero.\nI am Chang Chunzi, thank you for your generosity, but I have urgent matters to attend to, I won't be able to thank you properly today, we'll meet again in the future.
Huh? This Pill is...\nCould this be what the senior meant by "not treating for nothing"?
Kid, someone has reported you, come back with us to the Government Office!
column3: ไอ้หนู มีคนแจ้งความเจ้าแล้ว กลับมากับพวกเราที่ศาลาว่าการ!

column2: You're sensible! Take him back and let the prefect decide his crime.
You dare to resist arrest, kid!
You dare to arrest people without evidence, I'm not easy to mess with!
Kid, I'll lock you up in the jail, and we'll see how you brag then!\nTake him back and let the prefect decide his crime!
Young man, I want to ask you something.
Have you seen a man with a <color=#c44b0e>knife wound on his leg</color>?
Thank you for the information, young man! Here is your reward for providing information about the criminal, please accept it.
Bald thief, I didn't expect you to be hiding here!
Young man, thanks to you leading the way, this vicious criminal is finally going to be caught!
Good boy, you actually told these people about my hiding place!
Shi Chen, your luck ends today, surrender now.
Kid, I didn't expect you to be in cahoots with the government!\nDon't fall into my hands in the future, or I'll make you wish you were dead!
Enough talk! I've seen many tough guys like you!\nWait until you have the ability to escape from the jail alive.
Thanks to the young hero, we were able to arrest this thief,\nHere is your reward, young hero, please keep it.
To avoid any complications, we will take the criminal back to the Government Office now, goodbye.
column3: เพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงการแทรกแซง เราจะนำตัวคนร้ายกลับไปที่ศาลาว่าการทันที, ลาก่อน

column2: I wonder if this guy will repent and start a new life in the future...
So many people couldn't catch me, they are all useless!
I'm done playing with you guys, I'm outta here!
The cooked duck can actually fly!
I've inadvertently gotten myself into big trouble again...

That guy looks similar to a wanted criminal who set fire to the Armory a few years ago. We brothers questioned him, but he suddenly attacked. In the chaos, he was stabbed, injured several people and then ran away.
The prefect has issued a warrant for his arrest, urging us to capture this thief as soon as possible.\nAnyone who assists in capturing this thief will be rewarded with 10 taels of gold!
That guy will probably try to win people over with small favors and ask for help to heal his injuries.\nOnce he recovers, he will definitely kill to keep his secret!
For someone like you who's not deeply involved, don't lose your life trying to help.
Do you know where that wanted criminal is?\nHe's a bald monk with a knife wound on his leg, he might be hiding somewhere remote.
So this is Lin'an City, there are so many buildings, it's really different from a small village!\nHey, there seems to be someone ahead, let's go check it out.
It's you!\nYou came to Lin'an City too.
What a coincidence! Meeting is fate, how about we explore Lin'an City together?
Sure, I was worried about not having enough money.\nBut it seems like you don't lack friends around you, I'll wait for you at the inn.
Since you've asked, I'll reluctantly agree!\nIf you find me annoying, you can ask me to leave the team, but then you'll have to find me at the Ye Family Battalion.
I won't leave, the boss extends his wealthy hand, a hundred taels of money is not a small amount!
(Accepts the silver note handed over by the boss) You're wise, we'll meet again!
(Go over and chat with the worried-looking boss, how should I start the conversation?)

My skills are a combination of the strengths of all families, plus my own hard learning.

Well, well, well, look who it is. I didn't expect to see you here. What a twist of fate.
Is that you!? What are you doing here?
Ah, it's just my bad luck, running into a righteous young hero like you.\nThese dog-like officials abuse their power. If I can get out, I'll make them pay!
We've both suffered at the hands of those dog-like officials. We're both in the same boat.\nWe both want to escape right now. How about we bury the hatchet and work together?

Kid, just you wait and see!
How did you get in?

What are you planning to do?

I owe you one today. We'll meet again!
Dear guests, please be patient and listen to me...
Dear guests, please be quiet!

column2: The way of Confucianism lies in action rather than words. As Confucius said: "Cleanse the mouth, cultivate the body, regulate the family, govern the state, and bring peace to the world."\nWe put "cleanse the mouth" first. If you want to gain advantage by words, I'm willing to admit defeat.
Master Cai's concession is so grandiose that I have nothing to say.
Master Cai, what is the purpose of your visit this time?
Nephew Cai Youzhi, wishing the prince a happy birthday!
The master of the Confucius Temple, remembering old times, sincerely invites Chai Wang to return to the temple and take up the position of deputy master!
What old times do I have with that old man who seeks glory?\nTalking about "returning to the temple", it's really a big joke.
I have a letter to deliver to the prince.
Young Master Cai, Chai Wang's Mansion and Confucius Temple are enemies, not friends.\nLin'an City does not welcome you Confucius Temple, please run away.
(Hand a letter to Chai Wangye)
I will take my leave!

After Cai Youzhi left, Chai Wangye's face was cloudy and uncertain, as if he had a lot on his mind.
Under the reminder of the housekeeper, Chai Wangye hastily started the banquet.
Chai Wangye's face showed no joy, and the atmosphere at the banquet was unusually oppressive.
Everyone forced a few words of congratulations, all thinking about getting through the banquet as soon as possible and running away from this place of trouble.
Prince, there is poison in this food and drink!
What's going on? How could this happen.
I didn't expect you to have a detoxifying elixir on you, I was careless!
How does the taste of my <color=#c44b0e>Seven-Day Heartbreak Poison</color> feel?
You are from the <color=#c44b0e>Gu Immortal Sect</color>!
Yes, I am the current leader of the Gu Immortal Sect - Miao Muli.
I came here not for anything else, but to retrieve the sacred object that your people stole from my sect.
What sacred object, I don't understand what you're talking about.
I am very patient, but this Seven-Day Heartbreak Poison is not so patient.\nEvery moment that passes, your skills will be permanently weakened.
If you are interested in wasting a couple of shichen with me,\nby then, even the basic needs of a normal person will be a luxury for you.
Such a poisonous mind! But if you think this will force me to submit, you are too naive!
I don't understand why your brother would leave you here heartlessly,\nIsn't he afraid that the people here will vent their anger on you?
I didn't do anything wrong, why would they hate me?\nAnd we just took back our own things, there's nothing wrong with that, right?
You are really naive...
Ever since my brother took over as the leader, he has paid little attention to me...\nMaybe I didn't do well enough, didn't help him with the sect affairs, and made him unhappy.
What exactly is your sacred object? It seems familiar to me.
Hehe, this is a secret within our sect, it's not convenient to tell you.
So you guys are here!\nUncle Chai's heavy heart, might have a great relation with Confucius Temple.
No, I have to tell my father about what happened here as soon as possible.\nI'll take my leave first.
Miss Yinping, as a representative of General Ye to celebrate the birthday, you should take a seat.\nBut this young hero next to you might have to suffer a bit.
It's okay, I'll just stand behind Miss Ye and temporarily act as her follower.
Butterfly girl, the matter here has been resolved, where are you planning to go now? \nAre you going back to the Gu Immortal Sect alone?
It's called Thin Bamboo Stick, it's highly toxic and aggressive.
{PlayerGivenName} Brother, come here, touch them, \nthis way they will remember your scent and consider you as a friend.
The sect leader brother told me to return to the Gu Immortal Sect after the <color=#c44b0e>30th day</color>, \notherwise it would disrupt his plan.
So I don't know where to go now. \nHowever, since I'm out, I want to encounter some interesting things~
Anyway, I don't have a destination for now, I'm planning to travel around. \nWhy don't we travel together, we might encounter many interesting things.
{PlayerGivenName} Brother, you're so nice!
Wait a moment, I want to introduce my little companions to you~ \nYou're my friend, so naturally they will be your friends too.
(Takes out various poisonous insects from her body)
This is Xiao Hua, the most obedient.
This is Big White, so lazy.
Butterfly girl, there are too many people around me...
Butterfly can definitely do it alone, I will prove it to brother!
Sister, it seems that your <color=#c44b0e>Soft Bone Melting Powder</color> has no effect at all? \nWhat a waste, you can't even do such a small thing.
column3: พี่สาว, ดูเหมือนว่า <color=#c44b0e>ผงละลายกระดูกอ่อน</color> ของเจ้า, ไม่มีผลเลยเหรอ?\nเป็นเรื่องเสียเปล่า เจ้าไม่สามารถทำสิ่งเล็กๆ น้อยๆ เช่นนี้ได้

column2: I hope the Chai Palace can give us a response today. \nOtherwise, I can't guarantee what I will do next.
What explanation should I give?
Return our sect's sacred object!
What does your Gu Immortal Sect's sacred object have to do with me? \nYou must have found the wrong person.
I expected you to deny it, you should not know that the person who stole our sacred object slipped his mouth, \nthis matter is definitely related to you.
Today, the elite disciples of all major sects are gathered here, I would like to ask: \nDo you self-proclaimed righteous sects help the just or the relatives?!
Why don't the prince explain to everyone, \nif these people are making trouble, I will be the first to drive them out!
What is there to explain, \na good birthday banquet has been messed up, they are clearly here to make trouble.
I'm sorry, brother, it's Butterfly's fault,
You are from the <color=#c44b0e>Gu Immortal Sect</color>!
Yes, I am the current leader of the Gu Immortal Sect - Miao Muli.
We came here not for anything else, but to seek justice.
You notorious Gu Immortal Sect also wants justice? Ridiculous!
As expected of Chai Wangye, you have so many "righteous sects" backing you up. \nDo you know how many people in Lin'an City rely on these forty wells in the city for their livelihood?
You! It's indeed the style of evil sects, always threatening to poison the whole city. \nNo wonder the martial arts world in Central Plains deeply hates your Gu Immortal Sect!
Our Gu Immortal Sect will never kill innocents, these people will just suffer from a serious illness. \nBut we will let them know that they are suffering for no reason because of you!
Miao Muli, this prince won't give in easily, let me help you.
Today is destined to be a glorious day for our Dragonfly City.
How did the Gu Immortal Sect collude with the people of Ying Island?
{yell}Warriors of Dragonfly City, emerge from the darkness!
Dragonfly City... Dragonfly challenging the elephant, truly omnipresent.

I've challenged countless sects, and I believe that the skills of Dragonfly City far surpass those of the Central Plains martial arts!\nToday, the heirs of all major sects are here, it's a good opportunity to witness each other's skills!
There's no need to talk about benevolence and morality when dealing with barbarians.
Although our Melody House and Nine Factions Sect have always been at odds,\ntoday we are willing to join forces to meet these "guests" from Dragonfly City.
The Gu Immortal Sect poisoned first, and Dragonfly City harbored ill intentions afterwards,\nsuch actions against chivalry, our Taoist Sect will not stand by!
Amitabha, the disputes of the martial arts world have nothing to do with Shifa Temple, this old monk chooses to stay out of it.
It's rare to see Martial Arts from outside the Central Plains, our Ye Family Battalion will also meet them.
Hehe, since you all can't wait, let's go together!

Cough, the Martial Arts of the Central Plains are indeed profound, I have learned a lot.\nOur Dragonfly City will not admit defeat, the humiliation of today will be returned a hundredfold in the future!
Chai Wangye, it seems I miscalculated, I didn't expect so many people to stand up for you.\nOne day I will retrieve the sacred object in a fair and square manner, we will meet again in the future!
With you?\nI'm afraid you're not qualified.
If you're scared, go back to your Dragonfly City!
Joke, how could I be afraid of a greenhorn like you.\nIf you want to be my sacrificial knife, then I will fulfill you!

The skills of Dragonfly City are nothing more than that, there's no difference between you and a child playing in front of me.\nGo back to your Dragonfly City and never set foot in the Central Plains again!
Bastard, don't you slander Dragonfly City!
Dragonfly City... Dragonfly challenging the tree is overestimating its abilities!
Kid, I'll remember you, be prepared to face my revenge in the future!
I didn't expect there to be such a hidden talent here, I admit defeat today.\nOne day I will retrieve the sacred object in a fair and square manner, we will meet again in the future!
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, everyone present here represents the top forces in the martial arts world.\nWith your current fame and status, I'm afraid you're not qualified to sit here.
Isn't there an empty seat? I can just sit there.
That seat is reserved for someone from the Ye Family Battalion,\nI wonder who they will send this year, I hope it's not that Demon King again...
Alright, I'll just stand in the corner,\nI'm just here to see the world, it doesn't matter if I have a seat or not.
A bunch of rabble, what can they change?
We are just a few unknown people in the martial arts world,\nbut we are more than enough to deal with you arrogant frogs in the well.
No need to waste words with them, quickly get rid of these small fries, we have important things to do!
Miao Muli, watch your tone when you talk to me!\nWe are just cooperating, you have no right to order me!
Good! The most pressing matter, let's not branch out.\nSince these guys are seeking death, let's fulfill them.
Hehe, it's still uncertain who will get the deer.

Cough, the Martial Arts of the Central Plains are indeed profound, I have learned a lot.\nOur Dragonfly City will not admit defeat, the humiliation of today will be returned a hundredfold in the future!

I didn't expect there to be so many masters among the younger generation, I admit defeat today.\nOne day I will retrieve the sacred object in a fair and square manner, we will meet again in the future!
What, no one is speaking? This is extremely impolite to the guests!
It seems that the Martial Arts of the Central Plains are indeed nothing more than this, unbearable to look at, unable to withstand a single blow!
Even if the Authentic sect kung fu of the Taoist Sect is remarkable,\nyou are too arrogant, you are really asking for trouble.
Hehe, I've been itching these few days, you guys are kind enough to scratch it for me.
{yell} Who is it, attacking secretly!
How does the chicken butt I invited you to eat taste?\nYour mouth is too stinky, just right for each other.
Master Uncle, you are here, almost missed a big event!
You brat stay quiet, the so-called early arrival is not as good as the opportune arrival,\nI will deal with these guys who do not know the immensity of heaven and earth.
Hey, kid watching the fun! Come and give me a hand.\nDon't hang up early, otherwise I won't be interested in continuing.
To fight so many people, I have a problem with self-preservation, I can't afford to be your helper.
If you can't even handle this little scene, what are you doing in the world!\nIf you can hold on, you will naturally benefit a lot.
Hey! Are you looking down on us by asking this kid for help?

Cough, the Martial Arts of the Central Plains are indeed profound, I have learned a lot.\nOur Dragonfly City will not admit defeat, the humiliation of today will be returned a hundredfold in the future!
I didn't expect the master of the Taoist Sect to back you up, I admit defeat today.\nOne day I will retrieve the holy object in a fair and square manner, we will meet again in the future!
Sigh...
column3: เฮ้อ...

column2: Prince, I have already made a move once,\nSince I couldn't repel them, it seems that this is the will of heaven. I won't accompany you!
Master Uncle is really willful...
Chai Wangye, now no one can help you, right,\nShouldn't you hand over the holy object?
Hmph!
(Take out a copper ring and give it to Miao Muli)
Brother, I'm afraid it's not glorious for us to retrieve the holy object in this way.
Humph, what do you know!\nIf you don't care about the details, when will the holy object be retrieved.
You are still too naive, don't go back with us,\nGo to the Central Plains for a while and then return to the stockade, so as not to embarrass me.
Woo, Cai Die knows.
Let's send the holy object back to the church!
Hehehe...Taoist Sect, it's nothing more than that!
A birthday banquet is full of troubles, and the host and guest have their own thoughts,\nSo the banquet ended hastily, and everyone excused themselves and ran away.
So you are here! The birthday banquet is over, and everyone else has left.\nI need to tell my father about what happened here as soon as possible, so I will run away first.
So many things happened in just one day.\nI don't know what was written in the letter that made Chai Wangye change his face and lose his composure.
I don't know why the Gu Immortal Church asked Chai Wangye for the holy object,\nWhy did you collude with the unknown Dragonfly City...
This level of martial arts incident is not something that a nameless pawn like me can intervene...
While the figures of the major sects have not yet dispersed,\nI should try to see if there is a chance to join these major sects.

As the guests take their seats, the birthday feast of Chai Wangye officially begins.
Chai Wangye and the visiting guests exchange pleasantries one by one, followed by the guests taking turns to present gifts and mutual flattery...
The whole process and style are no different from the birthday celebrations of wealthy households you've seen in the countryside.
If this is the world of martial arts, why did I leave my hometown to venture here?
You look at them, suddenly feeling a sense of disillusionment, until a shrill voice comes...
Alright, alright, we'll take our leave.
It seems that Chai Wangye, being a high-ranking official, has forgotten his old master...
Young Master Cai, what are you doing here? I did not invite you.
It's rare to see <color=#c44b0e>all walks of life</color> gathered together, the cream of the martial arts world.\nChai Wangye, your birthday feast is indeed a rare grand event.
Cai Youzhi, our Ou Ye family and Confucius Temple are incompatible,\nare you here to seek death today?
Are you trying to settle our family's grudges here at Chai Wangye's birthday feast?

Not to mention whether you can get what you want, just for spoiling Chai Wangye's mood,\neven if you are the direct disciple of the <color=#c44b0e>Sword Saint</color>, I'm afraid you can't afford the punishment.
One day, you Confucius Temple will pay the price!
I'm ready anytime!
Chai Wangye invited us to discuss how to deal with those who betray their masters for glory.\nThe people of Confucius Temple came uninvited today, isn't this asking for trouble?
The imperial edict is here, Chai Wangye, receive the edict——

As for who betrays their master for glory, it's too early to say, it's better not to speak.\nOthers may not know the details of the <color=#c44b0e>Nine Factions Sect</color>, but wouldn't we Confucius Temple know?
Miss Murong, do you also want to give me some advice?
Nothing to advise, just can't stand your pretentious attitude!

People say that the disciples of <color=#c44b0e>Melody House</color> are all gentle and charming, it seems not entirely true.\nI advise Miss Murong, anger hurts the body, and it hurts the harmony between our two families.
If I have done anything wrong, I will personally apologize at your door another day.
Hmph, as you wish!
Young Master Cai, are you here to represent Confucius Temple to celebrate the birthday, or is it your own idea?
What's the difference?\nEither way, whatever I say or do, you will attribute it to Confucius Temple.
But the famous <color=#c44b0e>Taoist Sect</color> only sent an unknown disciple to celebrate the birthday.\nIs this the intention of the Taoist Sect, or your own idea?
This... It was my uncle who was invited to come, but... but he was delayed.\nIn order not to be rude, I temporarily took his place. It's really...

"The Chai family under my rule is loyal and has made great contributions, which pleases me greatly.\nI hereby grant the Chai family the hereditary title of king, so as not to fail the friendship between monarch and minister."
In that case, you have no say here,\nlet's wait for your uncle to arrive and hear his high opinion.
The heart of evil grows, the heart of Tao fades
Sigh...
By the decree of the emperor——
Your servant receives the decree and thanks for the grace.
Chai Wangye, today is your big day, I shouldn't be talking too much.\nBut these people who came to celebrate your birthday, they have complicated backgrounds, if the emperor knew...
Eunuch, you're joking. I've been busy with state affairs, and only have the chance to meet friends at the banquet.\nWhat about the boxes of treasures you stored with me, when will you take them back?
Oh, the emperor clearly sees your daily efforts and loyalty.\nThen I won't disturb you and your friends.
Thank you, Eunuch.
column3: ขอบคุณ ท่านขันที

column2: I've long been disgusted with the pretentiousness of those people from the Confucius Temple.\nIf it weren't for their meddling, Uncle Yang's family wouldn't have been implicated and exterminated.
Hey, aren't you guys from Confucius Temple assisting the false Qi Emperor in Bianjing?\nRunning to Lin'an City, aren't you afraid of being caught as a spy?
So it's Miss Ye from the Ye Family Battalion, it's said that Miss Ye is as brave as a man,\nand it's indeed true today.
It's said that Confucius Temple has a set of Elegant Romanticist, a spear technique that kills to stop killing, specifically against battle formations,\nI've never had the chance to see it.

Today I have this opportunity, I want to compete with Cai Gongzi in the name of celebrating his birthday.\nWe'll stop at the slightest touch, it won't hurt the harmony and it won't be inappropriate, I wonder if Uncle Chai would allow it?
If my niece wants to liven up the atmosphere, I will certainly allow it.\nBut Cai Gongzi may not be willing to give this face.
Since Miss Ye has said so, I have no reason to refuse.\nI ask the seniors present to give me some advice.
Miss Ye's Thunder Spear is quite good, I admit defeat.
Hmph, that'll teach you not to underestimate Ye Family's spear technique!
I had to use all my strength to barely block Miss Ye's Thunder Spear,\nIt seems that Ye Family's spear technique is indeed not to be underestimated.
Hmph, you're complimenting me on the surface, but you must be very pleased inside.\nI haven't mastered my spear technique yet, I'll ask for your advice next time I have the chance!
